name: Sam & Max Hit the Road
notes: Requires the latest version of GOG's Linux installer.

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer
game:
  game_id: samnmax
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/GOG
    file: goginstaller
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/GOG/data/noarch/data
scummvm:
  aspect: true
